title: SIMBA Driver
description: The schema describes how the SIMBA driver is executed

runId.title: A unique ID identifying the run to be executed

cellId.title: A unique ID identifying the currently running experimental setup

initialTime.title: Time associated with the initial tick

endTime.title: The stooping time of the simulation
endTime.description: The simulation stops once initialTime plus all accumulated durations (tickDuration) exceeds the endTime

continueFromTick.title: Optional Continuation
continueFromTick.description: This attribute allows to continue a previously executed simulation at the given tick

scheduleIntervals.title: Scheduled Simulation Intervals
scheduleIntervals.description: The intervals are executed in the listed order and must not overlap.

tickDuration.title: Time Duration per Tick of the Interval
